data.comment: John Buckley is on a sub for Corry Evans for Blackburn.
In the minute 9, At Ewood Park, Todd Kane has been yellow-carded for the away team.
QPR's Rob Dickie has been booked in Blackburn.
The first-half has come to a close in Blackburn.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
QPR make their first substitution with Osman Kakay replacing Dominic Ball.
Chris Willock is replacing Albert Adomah for the away team.
In the minute 50, Goal! Ben Brereton gives Blackburn a 1-0 lead in Blackburn.
An attacking QPR player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Lyndon Dykes equalizes with a well-taken penalty.
In the minute 66, Bradley Johnson (Blackburn) gets a yellow card.
The away team have replaced Lyndon Dykes with Macauley Bonne. This is the third substitution made today by Mark Warburton.
Adam Armstrong is on target to give Blackburn a 2-1 advantage.
In the minute 82, The home team replace Ben Brereton with Sam Gallagher.
Macauley Bonne (QPR) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! Adam Armstrong extends Blackburn's lead to 3-1.
